Sniggering

{" "} It’s late. Or early, I’m not sure what to call it I’m not used to this. Its after four AM so I know I’m fine, I know I’ll be safe. Lately I’ve started feeling a presence. And it’s only when I come back home. What’s strange to me, is that is when I had started feeling comfortable at home as well. It’s all new, I’ve just moved here so it took me a while to settle in. But now that I’m finally getting comfortable here, calm, I’ve started feeling a presence. A presence that’s always hidden but I can sense it there.

I’m afraid of even talking about it, God I’ve contemplated penning it down for nights on end now, but I’m afraid if I talk about it and it comes true... That would be a nightmare.

But it’s almost dawn now and I can feel some comfort talking about this. I have to talk about this else I won’t be able to rest even though I can barely see what I’m typing.

I used to be able to sleep alone here with the lights closed, my pills helped a lot. But I’m not able to anymore. I need some sort of lights on. I don’t want it to be too bright so people outside, or things outside, can feel that I’m in here. But just enough that it's not pitch black anymore. Maybe the toilet, since I leave that open even when I’m not at home, or the kitchen because that one’s not bright enough but never all black. I can’t rest in pitch black.

I always pictured if I was being haunted I’d feel someone staring at me but It’s not eyes looking at me, or staring at me. It’s not someone preparing to hurt me, or scare me. None of that. Its like a being hiding behind the bathroom door when its open, head tilted all the way down, hands clasped in-front, just looking down at the floor and… simply unable to contain its sniggering. It just can’t stop it. It can’t stop giggling a blue giggle, one that’s compulsive. And when its not giggling, its doing something still, like sitting on my table or standing at the blind spot between my bed and the wardrobe. Anything that makes me aware of its presence. Sometimes when I open my blinds I feel its squatting down right in front of my window, still sniggering uncontrollably.

And it knows that I can feel it. The chills that runs down my spine as I write this, the same chill when I know it's there. The way my skin loses some colour. It knows I can feel it. Ands I think that’s what’s funny. That I’m afraid. And that I don’t get the joke. But why? Why me?

The feeling crawls up as soon as I enter the building. I feel someone’s following me inside. Walking right behind me like a prank,

“ooooo I better not let him catch m- OH! That was a close one, ohohohoheeehehhehehhehe sharp turn Johnny boy! Eehehehehehh!”

God I hope I never hear that laugh.

***

It follows me around the house as I go about changing my clothes and brushing my teeth until I lay down. Then it sits on my dining table. Hands clasped on the table top, still a grin carved from ear-to-ear. I just know it! Last night I woke up exactly three minutes to three. I could sense someone was with me in the house else I sleep like a brick. I got up and got done with my medicine, that part is irrelevant, but I swear after I turned off all the lights, I could see the cheek behind the bathroom door. The image is making me dissociate. I can still see its hair cleanly parted, like a small boy who wouldn’t survive the British winter. Thin, white arms moving inward towards the groin I can imagine a clasp. And I can imagine the sniggering too. God the sniggering is the worst. Why is it laughing at me?

I used to get why people laughed at me. People are mean, that’s what the doctor said, but why’s this creature mean. Screw what the doctor says why is it laughi GOD it’s so unsettling. Why do they follow me around and laugh at me when I’m asleep? I need to KNOW!

***

I lost a little track there, but I remember now. The reason I’m writing this down now, is because all this time I felt one presence, looking at me from afar and laughing at me UGH WHY DOES IT LAUGH AT ME ITS FUCKING IRRITATING ME!!!! THEY’VE NEVER LAUGHED AT ME SO WHY THIS ONE?!?!?

That’s a different issue. The bigger one is, there’s another now. This one’s closer. It doesn’t stay and snigger from afar, GOD that sniggering UGH I WANT TO JAM A BLUNT OBJECT THROUGH THAT SNIGGERING FACE WHY WHY WHY DOES IT LAUGH AT ME

***

I’m getting very upset about this, this is just like time before I got my pills but they’ve helped me a lot you’ve gotta understand this is not related to them. I’ve taken 3 20 minute breaks already and its about to be 7 am now, I can barely keep this going but I have to finish. There’s another one. This one is closer to me, this one always breezes behind me, like its making its presence obvious, like it wants to communicate. But more importantly it feels human. She feels human. I have to believe that these things are really here with me, you gotta believe me. As if she lived here before me. I don’t know when but she did live here before me. And I think it has to do with the sniggering, I think she’s trying to tell me something, maybe she’s experienced this too. Maybe that’s how she d-

***

I have to find out. It’s going to be hard if my medicine isn’t working anymore but if I have to survive I have to find out. I can’t stand the sniggering anymore I just can’t I can’t its too much I CANT WHY IS IT LAU-
